Africa/Cairo.description: Although Bir Tawil is officially not part of Egypt, union to avoid holes. The wikipedia article on Bir Tawil suggests that Egypt retains administrative control of the area (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bir_Tawil).

Africa/Ceuta.description: Isolate exclaves of Spain that are enclaves of Morocco.

Africa/Johannesburg.description: Add Antarctic Station of SANAE IV.

Africa/Juba.description: Initially add Ilemi Triangle to South Sudan area.  Whatever OSM thinks Kenya's border is is then used as seen in the next operation.  This avoids having holes.

America/Adak.description: Grab western parts of Aleutian Islands.

America/Anchorage.description: Grab part of Alaska between -162 longitude and Canadian border.

America/Argentina/Buenos_Aires.description: Grab part of Argentina near Buenos Aires.  Make an arbitrary boundary in the sea for the boundary with Rio Negro.

America/Argentina/Rio_Gallegos.description: Isolate most of Santa Cruz from the rest of Argentina.  Also, use arbitrary sea boundary between Santa Cruz and Tierra Del Fuego

America/Argentina/Salta.description: intersect part of Argentina to get Territorial waters and create an arbitrary sea boundary between Rio Negro and Buenos Aires.

America/Argentina/Ushuaia.description: Use arbitrary sea boundary between Santa Cruz and Tierra Del Fuego
Add Antarctic areas near Stations: Belgrano II, San Martín, Vernadsky, Esperanza and Arctowski.
Add Antarctic area near Orcadas Station.

America/Bahia_Banderas.description: Grab part of Mexico to get terriritorial waters near Bahía de Banderas.

America/Cayenne.description: Grab the part of France that represents French Guiana.

America/Chicago.description: Include small region east of Fort Pierre
Draw the line slightly east of ND 31
Omit a few towns in Alabama close to Georgia that observe eastern time

America/Danmarkshavn.description: Grab part of Greenland and make a best guess at this timezone's location.

America/Fortaleza.description: intersect relevant part of Brazil to preserve terriritorial waters

America/Goose_Bay.description: Grab part of Canada to make timezone in northern Labrador.  Includes a slightly educated guess on timezone boundary in Labrador.

America/Guayaquil.description: Isolate mainlaind of Ecuador by excluding Galapagos islands.

America/Havana.description: Exclude Guantanamo Bay US Military base from the rest of Cuba.

America/Hermosillo.description: Grab part of Mexico including part of the Gulf of California.  The results in making an arbitrary boundary in the Gulf of California.

America/Lower_Princes.description: Union an area such that the disputed area of Oyster Pond is included. See article: http://www.dclportal.dreamhosters.com/news/latest-news/9228-negotiations-on-oyster-pond-border-to-commence-late-2019.
Diff the Dutch part of Saint Martin.

America/Marigot.description: Union an area such that the disputed area of Oyster Pond is included. See article: http://www.dclportal.dreamhosters.com/news/latest-news/9228-negotiations-on-oyster-pond-border-to-commence-late-2019.
Diff the French part of Saint Martin.

America/Mazatlan.description: Grab part of Mexico to make this timezone.  This operation results in two arbitrary sea boundaries - one near Los Mochis and another near Puerto Vallarta.

America/Metlakatla.description: Intersect part of this county.  This operation results in an arbitrary sea boundary to the west of the Annette Island Airport.

America/Mexico_City.description: Grab part of Mexico to make this timezone.  This operation results in three arbitrary sea boundaries - one near Puerto Vallarta, one near Tampico and another near Ciudad del Carmen.

America/New_York.description: Add Guantanamo Bay US Military Base to this timeonze.
Add areas in Alabama near Phenix City and Lanett that observe eastern time.  The boundaries are a speculative guess.

America/Nome.description: Intersect part of Alaska to make this timezone.  Includes an arbitrary sea boundary in the Aleutian islands between Umnak Island and Chuginadak Island.

America/Noronha.description: Intersect the boundary of Brazil to isolate Fernando de Noronha archipelago.

America/Nuuk.description: Exclude area from Greenland used to make America/Scoresbysund
Exclude area from Greenland used to make America/Danmarkshavn
Exclude area from Greenland used to make America/Thule

America/Puerto_Rico.description: Intersect the part of USA that includes Puerto Rico.  This results in an arbitrary sea boundary between Isla de Culebra and the Virgin Islands.

America/Punta_Arenas.description: Add Antarctic Areas.  Includes stations General Bernardo O'Higgins, Great Wall, Bellinghausen and Artigas.

America/Recife.description: Isolate mainlaind part of Pernambuco to exlude Fernando de Noronha archipelago and other islands.

America/Santiago.description: Include only mainlaind Chile (Exclude Easter Island)

America/Sao_Paulo.description: Extract parts of Brazil to preserve terriritorial waters and diff against a few Brazilian states.

America/Scoresbysund.description: Grab part of Greenland and make a best guess at this timezone's location.

America/Sitka.description: Intersect part of this county.  This operation results in an arbitrary sea boundary to the west of the Annette Island Airport.
Since this zone required the creation of a hole inside of it, this USA is diffed against the resulting geometry of the two previous operations.
Intersect part of Alaska.  This operation results in an arbitrary sea boundary based off of the last observed trajectory of the sea boundary of Sitka and Hoonah-Angoon counties.

America/St_Johns.description: Grab part of Canada that includes Newfoundland and nearby sea area.  Also includes guesstimate of part of Labrador that observes St Johns time.

America/St_Thomas.description: Intersect the USA to isolate the US Virgin Islands.  This operation results in an arbitrary sea boundary between Puerto Rico and the island of St Thomas.

America/Thule.description: Grab part of Greenland and make a best guess at this timezone's location.

America/Tijuana.description: Intersect part of Mexico.  This operation creates an arbitrary sea boundary in the Gulf of California.

Antarctica/Casey.description: Best guess at extent of Casey timezone based off of map at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Time_in_Antarctica, but subtracting area for Vostok and Mirny Stations.

Antarctica/Davis.description: Best guess at extent of Davis timezone.

Antarctica/DumontDUrville.description: Best guess at extent of DumontDUrville timezone based off of map at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Time_in_Antarctica, but subtracting area for Concordia Station (Australia/Perth).

Antarctica/Macquarie.description: Intersect part of Australia to isolate Macquarie Island.

Antarctica/Mawson.description: Best guess at extent of Mawson timezone.  This timezone also includes the Zhongshan and Bharati stations because apparently they also use UTC+5 https://encyclopedia.timegenie.com/time_zones/antarctica/.

Antarctica/McMurdo.description: Best guess at McMurdo timezone according to map of timezone at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Time_in_Antarctica.  Includes South Pole timezone since it is linked to McMurdo in the timezone DB.

Antarctica/Rothera.description: Best guess at Rothera timezone partially based off of British Antarctic Claims.

Antarctica/Syowa.description: Best guess at Syowa timezone according to map of timezone at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Time_in_Antarctica.  Also, Mirny station uses the same timezone as Vostok according to https://encyclopedia.timegenie.com/time_zones/antarctica/.  Also includes Japanese Asuka Station.

Antarctica/Troll.description: Best guess at Troll timezone according to map of timezone at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Time_in_Antarctica, but subtracting area to west starting with SANAE IV station.  Also includes Maitri and Novolazarevskaya Stations.

Antarctica/Vostok.description: Best guess at Vostok timezone according to map of timezone at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Time_in_Antarctica.  Also, Mirny station uses the same timezone as Vostok according to https://encyclopedia.timegenie.com/time_zones/antarctica/.

Arctic/Longyearbyen.description: Intersect part of Norway to isolate various North Atlantic islands.

Asia/Bangkok.description: Northern Vietnam had the same timekeeping method as Thailand, so this is added before adding Thailand. See (https://github.com/evansiroky/timezone-boundary-builder/issues/66)
Isolate Northern Vietnam as it is a part of Asia/Bangkok. See (https://github.com/evansiroky/timezone-boundary-builder/issues/66)

Asia/Famagusta.description: Draw a polygon with a boundary that goes through the center of the United Nations Buffer Zone.  A subsequent operation will difference the buffer zone to create the exact boundary of this timezone.  This operation also results in arbitraty sea boundaries near Famagusta and Kokkina.

Asia/Gaza.description: Intersect the Palestinian Territories to isolate Gaza.

Asia/Hebron.description: Intersect the Palestinian Territories to isolate the West Bank.

Asia/Ho_Chi_Minh.description: Exclude Northern Vietnam as it is a part of Asia/Bangkok. See (https://github.com/evansiroky/timezone-boundary-builder/issues/66)
Exclude Scarborough Shoal because it's not claimed by Vietnam (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scarborough_Shoal)

Asia/Hovd.description: Intersect the western part of Mongolia.

Asia/Jakarta.description: Intersect the western part of Indonesia.

Asia/Jayapura.description: Exclude all parts of Indonesia to the west of Maluku and North Maluku

Asia/Kuala_Lumpur.description: Intersect Malaysia to include only the Malay Peninsula.

Asia/Kuching.description: Intersect Malaysia to include only Malaysian Borneo.

Asia/Nicosia.description: Draw a polygon with a boundary that goes through the center of the United Nations Buffer Zone.  A subsequent operation will union the buffer zone to create the exact boundary of this timezone.  This operation also results in arbitraty sea boundaries near Famagusta and Kokkina.

Asia/Sakhalin.description: Intersect part of the Sakhalin Oblast to include only the island of Sakhalin.

Asia/Shanghai.description: Add disputed area in Doklam.  See https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E4%B8%8D%E8%BE%B9%E7%95%8C%E4%BA%89%E8%AE%AE and https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doklam
Add disputed area in Doklam.  See https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E4%B8%8D%E8%BE%B9%E7%95%8C%E4%BA%89%E8%AE%AE and https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doklam
Add disputed area in Doklam.  See https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E4%B8%8D%E8%BE%B9%E7%95%8C%E4%BA%89%E8%AE%AE and https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doklam
Add disputed area in Doklam.  See https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E4%B8%8D%E8%BE%B9%E7%95%8C%E4%BA%89%E8%AE%AE and https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doklam
Add disputed area along Northwest Bhutan-China border.  See https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E4%B8%8D%E8%BE%B9%E7%95%8C%E4%BA%89%E8%AE%AE
All areas of Taiwain are assumed to be a part of Asia/Taipei.  See discussion at https://github.com/evansiroky/timezone-boundary-builder/issues/52

Asia/Srednekolymsk.description: Intersect part of Sakha Republic to make sure Russian territorial waters are included.

Asia/Thimphu.description: Add disputed area in Doklam.  See https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E4%B8%8D%E8%BE%B9%E7%95%8C%E4%BA%89%E8%AE%AE and https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doklam
Add disputed area in Doklam.  See https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E4%B8%8D%E8%BE%B9%E7%95%8C%E4%BA%89%E8%AE%AE and https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doklam
Add disputed area in Doklam.  See https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E4%B8%8D%E8%BE%B9%E7%95%8C%E4%BA%89%E8%AE%AE and https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doklam
Add disputed area in Doklam.  See https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E4%B8%8D%E8%BE%B9%E7%95%8C%E4%BA%89%E8%AE%AE and https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doklam
Add disputed area along Northwest Bhutan-China border.  See https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E4%B8%8D%E8%BE%B9%E7%95%8C%E4%BA%89%E8%AE%AE

Asia/Ust-Nera.description: Intersect part of Sakhalin that includes Kuril Islands.

Asia/Vladivostok.description: Intersect part of Sakha Republic to add Anzhu Islands.

Asia/Yakutsk.description: Grab working area, excluding unneeded parts to east and west.

Atlantic/Canary.description: Intersect part of Spain to isolate Canary Islands

Atlantic/Madeira.description: Intersect to isolate Maderia and Salvage Islands.

Atlantic/South_Georgia.id: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

Atlantic/St_Helena.id: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha

Australia/Adelaide.description: Intersect part of South Australia to preserve Australian territorial waters.

Australia/Brisbane.description: Intersect part of Queensland to preserve Australian territorial waters.
Exclude Holiday Islands from Queensland via an arbitraty sea boundary.

Australia/Darwin.description: Intersect part of Northern Territory to preserve Australian territorial waters.

Australia/Hobart.description: Extract Tasmania from Australia to include territorial waters.

Australia/Lindeman.description: Exclude Holiday Islands from Queensland via an arbitraty sea boundary.

Australia/Lord_Howe.description: Intersect to include only Lord Howe Island.

Australia/Melbourne.description: Intersect part of Victoria to preserve Australian territorial waters.

Australia/Perth.description: According to chatter on the tz mailing list, the Antrarctic Concordia Station uses Australia/Perth time.  https://mm.icann.org/pipermail/tz/2013-December/020520.html
Remove Eucla portion since it's also added to the Western Australia relation.

Etc/UTC.description: Add Antarctic Station Neumayer III Station.  See discussion at https://github.com/evansiroky/timezone-boundary-builder/issues/61

Europe/Amsterdam.description: Intersect to include only European area of The Netherlands.

Europe/Astrakhan.description: Union to fill in some exclaves.

Europe/Berlin.description: Exclude area belonging to Busingen timezone.

Europe/Busingen.description: Isolate area belonging to Busingen timezone.

Europe/Lisbon.description: Intersect to include only mainlaind of Portugal

Europe/Madrid.description: Intersect to include only mainlaind of Spain and Balearic Islands.

Europe/Moscow.description: Union with part of Moscow timezone along a river to cover holes between the OSM boundaries of Saratov and the Moscow timezone

Europe/Oslo.description: Intersect to include only mainlaind part of Norway.

Europe/Paris.description: Intersect to include only European part of France.

Europe/Samara.description: Union this area to add some exclaves that probably don't belong to Moscow timezone

Europe/Vienna.description: Add back Jungholz as union to Austria. See https://github.com/evansiroky/timezone-boundary-builder/issues/93

Indian/Christmas.description: Intersect to isolate Christmas Island area.

Indian/Cocos.description: Intersect to isolate Cocos Island area.

Indian/Kerguelen.description: Intersect to include French Islands in Southern Indian Ocean.

Indian/Mayotte.description: Intersect to grab terriritorial waters near Mayotte.

Indian/Reunion.description: Intersect to grab terriritorial waters near Reunion.

Pacific/Auckland.description: Intersect to include all areas except Chatham Islands.

Pacific/Easter.description: Intersect Chile to isolate Easter Island.

Pacific/Galapagos.description: Intersect Ecuador to isolate Galápagos Islands.

Pacific/Gambier.description: Intersect France to include Gambier Islands.

Pacific/Honolulu.description: Clip US boundary to include Hawaiian Island and Jonhston Atoll

Pacific/Kanton.description: Intersect Kiribati to include Kanton Island and some other atolls.

Pacific/Kiritimati.description: Intersect to include Kiribati's islands that are closest to the Americas.

Pacific/Kwajalein.description: Intersect Marshall Islands to isolate Kwajalein Atoll.

Pacific/Majuro.description: Difference Marshall Islands to exclude Kwajalein Atoll.

Pacific/Marquesas.description: Intersect France to isolate the Marquesas Islands.

Pacific/Midway.description: Intersect USA to isolate Midway and Kure Atolls.

Pacific/Noumea.description: Intersect France to isolate New Caledonia.

Pacific/Pago_Pago.description: Intersect USA to isoalte American Samoa.

Pacific/Saipan.description: Intersect USA to isolate Northern Mariana Islands.

Pacific/Tahiti.description: Intersect France to include French Polynesia except for the Gambier Islands.

Pacific/Tarawa.description: Intersect Kiribati to include westernmost islands.

Pacific/Wake.description: Intersect USA to isolate Wake Island.

Pacific/Wallis.description: Intersect France to isolate Wallis and Futuna Islands.
